DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to determine whether the hydrocodone and acetaminophen exposures following oral dosing of Vycavert are comparable to those following oral dosing of Norco.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Bioequivalence of Vycavert (10 mg Hydrocodone Bitartrate/325 mg Acetaminophen) Compared to the Reference Drug Norco
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2; and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs). Evidence or history of clinically significant disease History of obstructive sleep apnea Life time history and/or recent evidence of alcohol and/or drug abuse
